column3: GENERAL WEATHER FORECAST FOR NEXT 36 HOURS

column1: Showers or thunder showers will occur over most places of the country during the evening or night.
Fairly heavy showers above 75 mm can be expected at some places in Northern, North-central and
Easten provinces and in Matale district.

column2: howers may occur in coastal areas of southern province during the morning.
